document.heading: Cooperative Loan Interest Rate Modification Act of 1980

history.narrative: Law 3-73, the “Cooperative Loan Interest Rate Modification Act of 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-223, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first, amended first and second readings on March 4, 1980, April 1, 1980 and April 22, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 14, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-182 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
